charges.charge_description: Cts. 1-2: Transporting certain aliens within the United States 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) and 1324(a)(1)(A)(v)(ll); Offense Date: 1/27/03; Penalty: 5 yrs (unless comm. adv. then 10) and/or $250, 000 plus 3 year supervised release term as to each count (1-2)

Defts did knowingly, willfully and in reckless disregard of the fact that two undocumented aliens had entered the United States in violation of law and were then and there present in the United States in violation of law and was then and there present in the United States in violation of law, did transport and move said aliens by means of a motor vehicle in furtherance of such violation of law; In violation 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) as to both Defts and 18 USC 2 as to Deft No. 2; [1:03-m-380]

Cts. 1-2: Transporting certain aliens within the United States 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) and 1324(a)(1)(A)(v)(ll); Offense Date: 1/27/03; Penalty: 5 yrs (unless comm. adv. then 10) and/or $250, 000 plus 3 year supervised release term as to each count (1-2)

Defts did knowingly, willfully and in reckless disregard of the fact that two undocumented aliens had entered the United States in violation of law and were then and there present in the United States in violation of law and was then and there present in the United States in violation of law, did transport and move said aliens by means of a motor vehicle in furtherance of such violation of law; In violation 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) as to both Defts and 18 USC 2 as to Deft No. 2; [1:03-m-380]
